name: Pecatu Indah Resort
address: 54MJ+VPF, Jl. Raya Uluwatu, Pecatu, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
I always like to go for walk at Pecatu Indah resort. It is a beautiful place located in the heart of south Bali. This huge area is a resort development land with hotels, luxury villas, facillities that is so well maintained --- the cleanliness is on point !

Dogs are most welcome here ü´∂
They seem to thoroughly enjoy this area.¬† Me and my husband frequently saw many owners with their dogs were walking on  leash around jogging track close to the road. This lovely area is suitable for you to relax, walk around and have a great view of many of the surrounding buildings üåø‚òÄÔ∏è‚ú®Ô∏è
review 2: It is a nice place for you to warming up they have nice jogging track and when you are finish you can go to the beach take a good view of southern bali.
review 3: Nice Location hotel and dream land beach
review 4: Used to a grand resort complex in Southern peninsula of Bali.
review 5: Quite a well maintained place, can be considered as an elite residential place. For sure renting any house here doesn't come cheap. But you have a great place, great view, great beach nearby and large, not busy street.

name: Uluwatu Villa Amantes Stay
address: Jl. Pendem, Pecatu, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
types: bed_and_breakfast, breakfast_restaurant, hotel, lodging, restaurant, food
review 1:
Adorable hotel. I definitely recommend to choose this one. Incredible friendly staff and service. You can leave your luggage and to do yoga or something if you have a time gap between check out and something else. Absolutely stunning hotel on the photos, but in the reality even better. The pool has really warm water, I enjoyed to swim. Breakfast is delicious and dishes are so stylish from wood. I really liked that personnel remember names of guests. A lot of likes!
The only one thing what they can improve, to change some small towels to new ones and to add hair conditioner. That‚Äôs all!
review 2: Super nice and cozy design boutique hotel in a quiet area. The stuff is amazing, they are super professional and lovely as well ‚ò∫Ô∏èwe had a great time there (4 nights) and for me this was the best hotel in the travel vacations to Bali, where we slept in a lot of different hotels! We will definitely come back ‚ù§Ô∏è
review 3:
Uluwatu Villa Amantes Stay Review

Villa Amantes Stay in Uluwatu is a true gem, offering a unique and heartwarming experience for its guests. From the moment of arrival, the standout feature is the exceptional friendliness and hospitality of the staff. They make you feel like a cherished guest, adding a personal touch to the entire stay.

The bungalows strike a perfect balance between comfort and elegance. Thoughtfully equipped with all the essentials, they provide a cozy and inviting space to unwind. The attention to detail in every aspect, from the decor to the amenities, ensures a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

Breakfast here is a delightful affair, showcasing a variety of delicious, well-prepared dishes. With both local and international options, it caters to different tastes, starting each day on a high note.

The service at Villa Amantes is remarkable. The staff are always willing to go the extra mile, whether it's providing insightful local travel tips, taking care of any requests, or engaging in friendly conversations. This level of care and attention plays a significant role in enhancing the overall experience.

In summary, Uluwatu Villa Amantes Stay is highly recommended for those seeking a comfortable stay complemented by heartfelt hospitality. It's a place where every aspect is carefully considered, allowing guests to fully enjoy the tranquility and charm of Uluwatu.
review 4: Oh my, I cannot say enough good things about Villa Amantes. From the amazing food to the beautifully decorated accommodation, it hit all the spots. But something that went completely unrivalled in all the places I stayed at in Bali, was the service and the warmth and friendliness of the staff that was working there. I would like to thank in particular, Wayan, Made, Sari, Rin and Pin for making me feel welcome and at home, I hope we will see each other soon, it would be a pleasure. I can guarantee you, you will have an amazing time here!
review 5: Wonderful. Lovely. Chill. Really kind people and I felt immediately at home. The room is perfect, I slept sooo good. Outside shower is amazing. The location is perfect. By scooter everything is reachable within 5-12 minutes. I definitely will come back here when I visit Uluwatu again. Thank you for a perfect and very relaxed stay! ‚ô•Ô∏è

name: The Hut Hut - Bungalows Uluwatu
address: The Hut Hut, Gg. Batu Nunggul, Pecatu, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hut Hut, a charming hotel in Bali, and I must say that my experience was absolutely delightful. From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by the aesthetic appeal of the boutique hotel - it is beautifully decorated and impeccably clean. The host was incredibly friendly and welcoming, making me feel right at home from the start. The personal touch and attention to detail really made a difference in my stay.

One of the highlights for me was the yoga meditation space available at Hut Hut. It provided a serene and peaceful environment for relaxation and reflection. The tranquility of the surroundings made it an ideal place for unwinding and rejuvenating.

In addition to its many wonderful qualities, Hut Hut is conveniently located near some fantastic restaurants, making it easy to explore the local culinary scene. The proximity to dining options added an extra layer of convenience enjoyment to my stay.

Furthermore, I felt safe and secure during my time at Hut Hut. The hotel is situated in a peaceful and secure area, providing me with peace of mind and allowing me to fully relax and enjoy my surroundings without any worries.

The overall atmosphere at Hut Hut was calm and serene, perfect for those looking to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life. I truly felt refreshed and rejuvenated after my stay.

Overall, my experience at Hut Hut was truly exceptional. From the beautiful aesthetics and cleanliness to the friendly host, tranquil atmosphere, convenient dining options nearby, and safe location, this hotel exceeded all my expectations. I highly recommend Hut Hut for anyone seeking a peaceful and rejuvenating retreat in Bali.
review 2: Beautiful villa with the most helpful members of staff available for all your needs throughout our stay. Providing fresh fruits for us every single morning, cleaning the entire place everyday, would highly recommend people to stay here.
review 3: Beautiful and very clean place. The staff is so nice and helpful ! In the morning you have someone preparing the coffee and fruits plate. We loved our stay here üòä

name: Kandahill Bali
address: Pecatu, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: The Hotel Serenity was a wonderful place to stay during our recent 2-day visit. The room was clean, comfortable, and well-appointed, with all the amenities we needed. The staff was friendly and helpful, and made us feel welcome throughout our stay. The hotel's location was perfect, just a short walk from all the shops and restaurants we wanted to visit. Overall, we had a very pleasant experience at the Hotel Serenity and would happily stay there again on our next trip to the area.
review 2: Beautiful retreat Homestay - gorgeous pool and grounds, close to central Uluwatu just 7 minutes by bike. The rooms are stylish and the staff very friendly. I‚Äôll definitely stay again!
review 3: This is definitely not a 4 star hotel. We stayed for one night and we got bit marks all over our body of only I can assume bedbugs!
review 4: This place is perfect!!!! So I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs up with the lower than 5 stars. I booked this place for my bridal party 26 people for 13 rooms so imagine how crazy we were and they tolerated us. We had 5 helpers and every single one of them were so kind and honest. My wedding day was hectic so we left a big mess at the villa and we came back to spotless rooms. Darmadi, the host helped us arrange BBQ dinner for the rehearsal dinner and it was so yummy. We love how beautiful and private this villa is. I highly recommend this place. Trust me You‚Äôll feel right at home when you walk in.
review 5:
Amazing place for big groups! This will be your perfect location away from the Bali hustle and bustle.

10/10 service staff. Big thank you to Putu and team for having 16 of us earlier this month.

name: Lulu‚Äôs Villas
address: Gg. Pande No.7, Pecatu, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
My wife and I recently had the pleasure of staying at Lulu‚Äôs Retreat in Bali, and it was nothing short of magical! From the moment we arrived, we were enveloped in the beauty of the venue, which served as the perfect backdrop for a truly relaxing experience.

The exceptional service was noticeable in every interaction, with staff going above and beyond to ensure our comfort. We could not get enough of the great food and coffee! And the vibes of the venue made it easy to connect with nature and unwind.

One of the highlights of our stay was meeting like-minded people and making new friends! The excellent weather also allowed us to fully enjoy the beautiful scenery that Bali is famous for.

Lulu‚Äôs was a five-star experience that we would not only recommend to others but are eagerly looking forward to repeating! The combination of a beautiful venue, exceptional service, and the opportunity to connect with both nature and wonderful people makes Lulu‚Äôs a place we definitely want to visit again!
review 2: A truly magical retreat in Bali! This has been one of my favorite stays to date. Everything, from the exquisite breakfast spread to the attentive and friendly staff, and the luxurious rooms, exceeded all expectations. The serene ambiance of the retreat instantly transports you to a state of tranquility and relaxation. Whether you're seeking a peaceful escape or an adventure-filled vacation, this retreat offers the perfect balance of serenity and excitement. I cannot recommend this place highly enough - a definite five-star experience!" was
review 3: Incredible place with such a heartfelt service. Absolutely enjoyed the time spent here. Food was incredible and the vibe of the entire place is so calming and relaxing. You can really enjoy hanging out by the pool or just kicking back. I would 100% recommend ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èüôè

review 5: The best villa in Uluwatu I could stay here forever! Stylish interior, clean amenities, spacious room & outdoor shower. I really love the pool and the library/listening space.
